title: Helper functions for TidyTuesday
text: goal tidytuesdaymeta provide usethis style package simplify creation week’s #tidytuesday. functions simply internal use, create_tidytuesday_folder(), next_tuesday(), next_week_num() functions may useful others.

title: Helper functions for TidyTuesday
